00084 static void node_sync_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *snode_v, void *node_v)
00085 {
00086     SpaceNode *snode= snode_v;
00087     
00088     if (snode->treetype==NTREE_SHADER) {
00089         nodeShaderSynchronizeID(node_v, 1);
00090         // allqueue(REDRAWBUTSSHADING, 0);
00091     }
00092 }

00094 static void node_socket_button_label(const bContext *UNUSED(C), uiBlock *block,
00095                               bNodeTree *UNUSED(ntree), bNode *UNUSED(node), bNodeSocket *sock,
00096                               const char *UNUSED(name), int x, int y, int width)
00097 {
00098     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, sock->name, x, y, width, NODE_DY, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00099 }

00101 /* draw function for file output node sockets.
00102  * XXX a bit ugly use atm, called from datatype button functions,
00103  * since all node types and callbacks only use data type without struct_type.
00104  */
00105 static void node_socket_button_output_file(const bContext *C, uiBlock *block,
00106                                            bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, bNodeSocket *sock,
00107                                            const char *UNUSED(name), int x, int y, int width)
00108 {
00109     uiLayout *layout, *row;
00110     PointerRNA nodeptr, sockptr, imfptr;
00111     int imtype;
00112     int rx, ry;
00113     RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_Node, node, &nodeptr);
00114     RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_NodeSocket, sock, &sockptr);
00115     
00116     layout = uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, x, y+NODE_DY, width, 20, UI_GetStyle());
00117     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);       
00118     
00119     uiItemL(row, sock->name, 0);
00120     
00121     imfptr = RNA_pointer_get(&nodeptr, "format");
00122     imtype = RNA_enum_get(&imfptr, "file_format");
00123     /* in multilayer format all socket format details are ignored */
00124     if (imtype != R_IMF_IMTYPE_MULTILAYER) {
00125         PropertyRNA *imtype_prop;
00126         const char *imtype_name;
00127         
00128         if (!RNA_boolean_get(&sockptr, "use_node_format"))
00129             imfptr = RNA_pointer_get(&sockptr, "format");
00130         
00131         imtype_prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&imfptr, "file_format");
00132         RNA_property_enum_name((bContext*)C, &imfptr, imtype_prop, RNA_property_enum_get(&imfptr, imtype_prop), &imtype_name);
00133         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSP);
00134         uiItemL(row, imtype_name, 0);
00135         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSN);
00136     }
00137     
00138     uiBlockLayoutResolve(block, &rx, &ry);
00139 }
00140 
00141 static void node_socket_button_default(const bContext *C, uiBlock *block,
00142                                 bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, bNodeSocket *sock,
00143                                 const char *name, int x, int y, int width)
00144 {
00145     switch (sock->struct_type) {
00146     case SOCK_STRUCT_NONE: {
00147         if (sock->link || (sock->flag & SOCK_HIDE_VALUE))
00148             node_socket_button_label(C, block, ntree, node, sock, name, x, y, width);
00149         else {
00150             PointerRNA ptr;
00151             uiBut *bt;
00152             
00153             RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_NodeSocket, sock, &ptr);
00154             
00155             bt = uiDefButR(block, NUM, B_NODE_EXEC, name,
00156                            x, y+1, width, NODE_DY-2, 
00157                            &ptr, "default_value", 0, 0, 0, -1, -1, NULL);
00158             if (node)
00159                 uiButSetFunc(bt, node_sync_cb, CTX_wm_space_node(C), node);
00160         }
00161         break;
00162     }
00163     case SOCK_STRUCT_OUTPUT_FILE:
00164         node_socket_button_output_file(C, block, ntree, node, sock, name, x, y, width);
00165         break;
00166     }
00167 }

00169 typedef struct SocketComponentMenuArgs {
00170     PointerRNA ptr;
00171     int x, y, width;
00172     uiButHandleFunc cb;
00173     void *arg1, *arg2;
00174 } SocketComponentMenuArgs;
00175 /* NOTE: this is a block-menu, needs 0 events, otherwise the menu closes */
00176 static uiBlock *socket_component_menu(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *args_v)
00177 {
00178     SocketComponentMenuArgs *args= (SocketComponentMenuArgs*)args_v;
00179     uiBlock *block;
00180     uiLayout *layout;
00181     
00182     block= uiBeginBlock(C, ar, __func__, UI_EMBOSS);
00183     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_KEEP_OPEN);
00184     
00185     layout= uiLayoutColumn(uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, args->x, args->y+2, args->width, NODE_DY, UI_GetStyle()), 0);
00186     
00187     uiItemR(layout, &args->ptr, "default_value", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, "", ICON_NONE);
00188     
00189     return block;
00190 }
00191 static void node_socket_button_components(const bContext *C, uiBlock *block,
00192                                    bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, bNodeSocket *sock,
00193                                    const char *name, int x, int y, int width)
00194 {
00195     switch (sock->struct_type) {
00196     case SOCK_STRUCT_NONE: {
00197         if (sock->link || (sock->flag & SOCK_HIDE_VALUE))
00198             node_socket_button_label(C, block, ntree, node, sock, name, x, y, width);
00199         else {
00200             PointerRNA ptr;
00201             SocketComponentMenuArgs *args;
00202             
00203             RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_NodeSocket, sock, &ptr);
00204             
00205             args= MEM_callocN(sizeof(SocketComponentMenuArgs), "SocketComponentMenuArgs");
00206             
00207             args->ptr = ptr;
00208             args->x = x;
00209             args->y = y;
00210             args->width = width;
00211             args->cb = node_sync_cb;
00212             args->arg1 = CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00213             args->arg2 = node;
00214             
00215             uiDefBlockButN(block, socket_component_menu, args, name, x, y+1, width, NODE_DY-2, "");
00216         }
00217         break;
00218     }
00219     case SOCK_STRUCT_OUTPUT_FILE:
00220         node_socket_button_output_file(C, block, ntree, node, sock, name, x, y, width);
00221         break;
00222     }
00223 }

00225 static void node_socket_button_color(const bContext *C, uiBlock *block,
00226                               bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, bNodeSocket *sock,
00227                               const char *name, int x, int y, int width)
00228 {
00229     /* XXX would be nicer to have draw function based on sock->struct_type as well,
00230      * but currently socket types are completely identified by data type only.
00231      */
00232     
00233     switch (sock->struct_type) {
00234     case SOCK_STRUCT_NONE: {
00235         if (sock->link || (sock->flag & SOCK_HIDE_VALUE))
00236             node_socket_button_label(C, block, ntree, node, sock, name, x, y, width);
00237         else {
00238             PointerRNA ptr;
00239             uiBut *bt;
00240             int labelw= width - 40;
00241             RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_NodeSocket, sock, &ptr);
00242             
00243             bt=uiDefButR(block, COL, B_NODE_EXEC, "",
00244                          x, y+2, (labelw>0 ? 40 : width), NODE_DY-2, 
00245                          &ptr, "default_value", 0, 0, 0, -1, -1, NULL);
00246             if (node)
00247                 uiButSetFunc(bt, node_sync_cb, CTX_wm_space_node(C), node);
00248             
00249             if (name[0]!='\0' && labelw>0)
00250                 uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, name, x + 40, y+2, labelw, NODE_DY-2, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00251         }
00252         break;
00253     }
00254     case SOCK_STRUCT_OUTPUT_FILE:
00255         node_socket_button_output_file(C, block, ntree, node, sock, name, x, y, width);
00256         break;
00257     }
00258 }

00262 #if 0 /* UNUSED */
00263 static void node_draw_socket_new(bNodeSocket *sock, float size)
00264 {
00265     float x=sock->locx, y=sock->locy;
00266     
00267     /* 16 values of sin function */
00268     static float si[16] = {
00269         0.00000000f, 0.39435585f,0.72479278f,0.93775213f,
00270         0.99871650f,0.89780453f,0.65137248f,0.29936312f,
00271         -0.10116832f,-0.48530196f,-0.79077573f,-0.96807711f,
00272         -0.98846832f,-0.84864425f,-0.57126821f,-0.20129852f
00273     };
00274     /* 16 values of cos function */
00275     static float co[16] ={
00276         1.00000000f,0.91895781f,0.68896691f,0.34730525f,
00277         -0.05064916f,-0.44039415f,-0.75875812f,-0.95413925f,
00278         -0.99486932f,-0.87434661f,-0.61210598f,-0.25065253f,
00279         0.15142777f,0.52896401f,0.82076344f,0.97952994f,
00280     };
00281     int a;
00282     
00283     glColor3ub(180, 180, 180);
00284     
00285     glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00286     for (a=0; a<16; a++)
00287         glVertex2f(x+size*si[a], y+size*co[a]);
00288     glEnd();
00289     
00290     glColor4ub(0, 0, 0, 150);
00291     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00292     glEnable( GL_LINE_SMOOTH );
00293     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00294     for (a=0; a<16; a++)
00295         glVertex2f(x+size*si[a], y+size*co[a]);
00296     glEnd();
00297     glDisable( GL_LINE_SMOOTH );
00298     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00299 }

00383 static void node_buts_curvecol(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
00384 {
00385     bNode *node= ptr->data;
00386     CurveMapping *cumap= node->storage;
00387

00389         cumap->flag |= CUMA_DRAW_SAMPLE;

00392     else 
00393         cumap->flag &= ~CUMA_DRAW_SAMPLE;
00394 
00395     uiTemplateCurveMapping(layout, ptr, "mapping", 'c', 0, 0);

00406 static void node_buts_normal(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
00407 {
00408     uiBlock *block= uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(layout);
00409     bNodeTree *ntree= ptr->id.data;
00410     bNode *node= ptr->data;
00411     rctf *butr= &node->butr;
00412     bNodeSocket *sock= node->outputs.first;     /* first socket stores normal */
00413     float *nor= ((bNodeSocketValueVector*)sock->default_value)->value;
00414     uiBut *bt;
00415     
00416     bt= uiDefButF(block, BUT_NORMAL, B_NODE_EXEC, "", 
00417                   (short)butr->xmin, (short)butr->xmin,
00418                   butr->xmax-butr->xmin, butr->xmax-butr->xmin,
00419                   nor, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0, 0, "");
00420     uiButSetFunc(bt, node_normal_cb, ntree, node);
00421 }

00423 static void node_browse_tex_cb(bContext *C, void *ntree_v, void *node_v)
00424 {
00425     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00426     bNodeTree *ntree= ntree_v;
00427     bNode *node= node_v;
00428     Tex *tex;
00429     
00430     if (node->menunr<1) return;
00431     
00432     if (node->id) {
00433         node->id->us--;
00434         node->id= NULL;
00435     }
00436     tex= BLI_findlink(&bmain->tex, node->menunr-1);
00437 
00438     node->id= &tex->id;
00439     id_us_plus(node->id);
00440     BLI_strncpy(node->name, node->id->name+2, sizeof(node->name));
00441     
00442     nodeSetActive(ntree, node);
00443     
00444     if ( ntree->type == NTREE_TEXTURE )
00445         ntreeTexCheckCyclics( ntree );
00446     
00447     // allqueue(REDRAWBUTSSHADING, 0);

00454 static void node_dynamic_update_cb(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(ntree_v), void *node_v)
00455 {
00456     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00457     Material *ma;
00458     bNode *node= (bNode *)node_v;
00459     ID *id= node->id;
00460     int error= 0;
00461 
00462     if (BTST(node->custom1, NODE_DYNAMIC_ERROR)) error= 1;
00463 
00464     /* Users only have to press the "update" button in one pynode
00465      * and we also update all others sharing the same script */
00466     for (ma= bmain->mat.first; ma; ma= ma->id.next) {
00467         if (ma->nodetree) {
00468             bNode *nd;
00469             for (nd= ma->nodetree->nodes.first; nd; nd= nd->next) {
00470                 if ((nd->type == NODE_DYNAMIC) && (nd->id == id)) {
00471                     nd->custom1= 0;
00472                     nd->custom1= BSET(nd->custom1, NODE_DYNAMIC_REPARSE);
00473                     nd->menunr= 0;
00474                     if (error)
00475                         nd->custom1= BSET(nd->custom1, NODE_DYNAMIC_ERROR);
00476                 }
00477             }
00478         }
00479     }
00480 
00481     // allqueue(REDRAWBUTSSHADING, 0);
00482     // allqueue(REDRAWNODE, 0);
00483     // XXX BIF_preview_changed(ID_MA);
00484 }

00486 static void node_buts_texture(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
00487 {
00488     bNode *node= ptr->data;
00489 
00490     short multi = (
00491         node->id &&
00492         ((Tex*)node->id)->use_nodes &&
00493         (node->type != CMP_NODE_TEXTURE) &&
00494         (node->type != TEX_NODE_TEXTURE)
00495     );
00496     
00497     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "texture", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00498     
00499     if (multi) {
00500         /* Number Drawing not optimal here, better have a list*/
00501         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "node_output", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00502     }
00503 }

00510 static int node_resize_area_default(bNode *node, int x, int y)
00511 {
00512     if (node->flag & NODE_HIDDEN) {
00513         rctf totr= node->totr;
00514         /* right part of node */
00515         totr.xmin = node->totr.xmax-20.0f;
00516         return BLI_in_rctf(&totr, x, y);
00517     }
00518     else {
00519         /* rect we're interested in is just the bottom right corner */
00520         rctf totr= node->totr;
00521         /* bottom right corner */
00522         totr.xmin = totr.xmax-10.0f;
00523         totr.ymax = totr.ymin+10.0f;
00524         return BLI_in_rctf(&totr, x, y);
00525     }
00526 }
00527 
00528 /* ****************** BUTTON CALLBACKS FOR COMMON NODES ***************** */
00529 
00530 /* width of socket columns in group display */
00531 #define NODE_GROUP_FRAME        120
00532 
00533 /* based on settings in node, sets drawing rect info. each redraw! */
00534 /* note: this assumes only 1 group at a time is drawn (linked data) */
00535 /* in node->totr the entire boundbox for the group is stored */
00536 static void node_update_group(const bContext *C, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *gnode)
00537 {
00538     if (!(gnode->flag & NODE_GROUP_EDIT)) {
00539         node_update_default(C, ntree, gnode);
00540     }
00541     else {
00542         bNodeTree *ngroup= (bNodeTree *)gnode->id;
00543         bNode *node;
00544         bNodeSocket *sock, *gsock;
00545         float locx, locy;
00546         rctf *rect= &gnode->totr;
00547         float node_group_frame= U.dpi*NODE_GROUP_FRAME/72;
00548         float group_header= 26*U.dpi/72;
00549         int counter;
00550         int dy;
00551         
00552         /* get "global" coords */
00553         nodeSpaceCoords(gnode, &locx, &locy);
00554         
00555         /* center them, is a bit of abuse of locx and locy though */
00556         node_update_nodetree(C, ngroup, locx, locy);
00557         
00558         rect->xmin = rect->xmax = locx;
00559         rect->ymin = rect->ymax = locy;
00560         
00561         counter= 1;
00562         for (node= ngroup->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00563             if (counter) {
00564                 *rect= node->totr;
00565                 counter= 0;
00566             }
00567             else
00568                 BLI_union_rctf(rect, &node->totr);
00569         }
00570         
00571         /* add some room for links to group sockets */
00572         rect->xmin -= 4*NODE_DY;
00573         rect->xmax += 4*NODE_DY;
00574         rect->ymin-= NODE_DY;
00575         rect->ymax+= NODE_DY;
00576         
00577         /* input sockets */
00578         dy = 0.5f*(rect->ymin+rect->ymax) + NODE_DY*(BLI_countlist(&gnode->inputs)-1);
00579         gsock=ngroup->inputs.first;
00580         sock=gnode->inputs.first;
00581         while (gsock || sock) {
00582             while (sock && !sock->groupsock) {
00583                 sock->locx = rect->xmin - node_group_frame;
00584                 sock->locy = dy;
00585 
00586                 /* prevent long socket lists from growing out of the group box */
00587                 if (dy-3*NODE_DYS < rect->ymin)
00588                     rect->ymin = dy-3*NODE_DYS;
00589                 if (dy+3*NODE_DYS > rect->ymax)
00590                     rect->ymax = dy+3*NODE_DYS;
00591                 dy -= 2*NODE_DY;
00592                 
00593                 sock = sock->next;
00594             }
00595             while (gsock && (!sock || sock->groupsock!=gsock)) {
00596                 gsock->locx = rect->xmin;
00597                 gsock->locy = dy;
00598                 
00599                 /* prevent long socket lists from growing out of the group box */
00600                 if (dy-3*NODE_DYS < rect->ymin)
00601                     rect->ymin = dy-3*NODE_DYS;
00602                 if (dy+3*NODE_DYS > rect->ymax)
00603                     rect->ymax = dy+3*NODE_DYS;
00604                 dy -= 2*NODE_DY;
00605                 
00606                 gsock = gsock->next;
00607             }
00608             while (sock && gsock && sock->groupsock==gsock) {
00609                 gsock->locx = rect->xmin;
00610                 sock->locx = rect->xmin - node_group_frame;
00611                 sock->locy = gsock->locy = dy;
00612                 
00613                 /* prevent long socket lists from growing out of the group box */
00614                 if (dy-3*NODE_DYS < rect->ymin)
00615                     rect->ymin = dy-3*NODE_DYS;
00616                 if (dy+3*NODE_DYS > rect->ymax)
00617                     rect->ymax = dy+3*NODE_DYS;
00618                 dy -= 2*NODE_DY;
00619                 
00620                 sock = sock->next;
00621                 gsock = gsock->next;
00622             }
00623         }
00624         
00625         /* output sockets */
00626         dy = 0.5f*(rect->ymin+rect->ymax) + NODE_DY*(BLI_countlist(&gnode->outputs)-1);
00627         gsock=ngroup->outputs.first;
00628         sock=gnode->outputs.first;
00629         while (gsock || sock) {
00630             while (sock && !sock->groupsock) {
00631                 sock->locx = rect->xmax + node_group_frame;
00632                 sock->locy = dy - NODE_DYS;
00633                 
00634                 /* prevent long socket lists from growing out of the group box */
00635                 if (dy-3*NODE_DYS < rect->ymin)
00636                     rect->ymin = dy-3*NODE_DYS;
00637                 if (dy+3*NODE_DYS > rect->ymax)
00638                     rect->ymax = dy+3*NODE_DYS;
00639                 dy -= 2*NODE_DY;
00640                 
00641                 sock = sock->next;
00642             }
00643             while (gsock && (!sock || sock->groupsock!=gsock)) {
00644                 gsock->locx = rect->xmax;
00645                 gsock->locy = dy - NODE_DYS;
00646                 
00647                 /* prevent long socket lists from growing out of the group box */
00648                 if (dy-3*NODE_DYS < rect->ymin)
00649                     rect->ymin = dy-3*NODE_DYS;
00650                 if (dy+3*NODE_DYS > rect->ymax)
00651                     rect->ymax = dy+3*NODE_DYS;
00652                 dy -= 2*NODE_DY;
00653                 
00654                 gsock = gsock->next;
00655             }
00656             while (sock && gsock && sock->groupsock==gsock) {
00657                 gsock->locx = rect->xmax;
00658                 sock->locx = rect->xmax + node_group_frame;
00659                 sock->locy = gsock->locy = dy - NODE_DYS;
00660                 
00661                 /* prevent long socket lists from growing out of the group box */
00662                 if (dy-3*NODE_DYS < rect->ymin)
00663                     rect->ymin = dy-3*NODE_DYS;
00664                 if (dy+3*NODE_DYS > rect->ymax)
00665                     rect->ymax = dy+3*NODE_DYS;
00666                 dy -= 2*NODE_DY;
00667                 
00668                 sock = sock->next;
00669                 gsock = gsock->next;
00670             }
00671         }
00672         
00673         /* Set the block bounds to clip mouse events from underlying nodes.
00674          * Add margin for header and input/output columns.
00675          */
00676         uiExplicitBoundsBlock(gnode->block,
00677                               rect->xmin - node_group_frame,
00678                               rect->ymin,
00679                               rect->xmax + node_group_frame,
00680                               rect->ymax + group_header);
00681     }
00682 }
00683 
00684 static void update_group_input_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *UNUSED(snode_v), void *ngroup_v)
00685 {
00686     bNodeTree *ngroup= (bNodeTree*)ngroup_v;
00687     
00688     ngroup->update |= NTREE_UPDATE_GROUP_IN;
00689     ntreeUpdateTree(ngroup);
00690 }
00691 
00692 static void update_group_output_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *UNUSED(snode_v), void *ngroup_v)
00693 {
00694     bNodeTree *ngroup= (bNodeTree*)ngroup_v;
00695     
00696     ngroup->update |= NTREE_UPDATE_GROUP_OUT;
00697     ntreeUpdateTree(ngroup);
00698 }
00699 
00700 static void draw_group_socket_name(SpaceNode *snode, bNode *gnode, bNodeSocket *sock, int in_out, float xoffset, float yoffset)
00701 {
00702     bNodeTree *ngroup= (bNodeTree*)gnode->id;
00703     uiBut *bt;
00704     
00705     if (sock->flag & SOCK_DYNAMIC) {
00706         bt = uiDefBut(gnode->block, TEX, 0, "", 
00707                       sock->locx+xoffset, sock->locy+1+yoffset, 72, NODE_DY,
00708                       sock->name, 0, sizeof(sock->name), 0, 0, "");
00709         if (in_out==SOCK_IN)
00710             uiButSetFunc(bt, update_group_input_cb, snode, ngroup);
00711         else
00712             uiButSetFunc(bt, update_group_output_cb, snode, ngroup);
00713     }
00714     else {
00715         uiDefBut(gnode->block, LABEL, 0, sock->name,
00716                  sock->locx+xoffset, sock->locy+1+yoffset, 72, NODE_DY,
00717                  NULL, 0, sizeof(sock->name), 0, 0, "");
00718     }
00719 }
00720 
00721 static void draw_group_socket(const bContext *C, SpaceNode *snode, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *gnode, bNodeSocket *sock, bNodeSocket *gsock, int index, int in_out)
00722 {
00723     bNodeTree *ngroup= (bNodeTree*)gnode->id;
00724     bNodeSocketType *stype= ntreeGetSocketType(gsock ? gsock->type : sock->type);
00725     uiBut *bt;
00726     float offset;
00727     int draw_value;
00728     float node_group_frame= U.dpi*NODE_GROUP_FRAME/72;
00729     float socket_size= NODE_SOCKSIZE*U.dpi/72;
00730     float arrowbutw= 0.8f*UI_UNIT_X;
00731     /* layout stuff for buttons on group left frame */
00732     float colw= 0.6f*node_group_frame;
00733     float col1= 6 - node_group_frame;
00734     float col2= col1 + colw+6;
00735     float col3= - arrowbutw - 6;
00736     /* layout stuff for buttons on group right frame */
00737     float cor1= 6;
00738     float cor2= cor1 + arrowbutw + 6;
00739     float cor3= cor2 + arrowbutw + 6;
00740     
00741     /* node and group socket circles */
00742     if (sock)
00743         node_socket_circle_draw(ntree, sock, socket_size);
00744     if (gsock)
00745         node_socket_circle_draw(ngroup, gsock, socket_size);
00746     
00747     /* socket name */
00748     offset = (in_out==SOCK_IN ? col1 : cor3);
00749     if (!gsock)
00750         offset += (in_out==SOCK_IN ? node_group_frame : -node_group_frame);
00751     
00752     /* draw both name and value button if:
00753      * 1) input: not internal
00754      * 2) output: (node type uses const outputs) and (group output is unlinked)
00755      */
00756     draw_value = 0;
00757     switch (in_out) {
00758     case SOCK_IN:
00759         draw_value = !(gsock && (gsock->flag & SOCK_INTERNAL));
00760         break;
00761     case SOCK_OUT:
00762         if (gnode->typeinfo->flag & NODE_CONST_OUTPUT)
00763             draw_value = !(gsock && gsock->link);
00764         break;
00765     }
00766     if (draw_value) {
00767         /* both name and value buttons */
00768         if (gsock) {
00769             draw_group_socket_name(snode, gnode, gsock, in_out, offset, 0);
00770             if (stype->buttonfunc)
00771                 stype->buttonfunc(C, gnode->block, ngroup, NULL, gsock, "", gsock->locx+offset, gsock->locy-NODE_DY, colw);
00772         }
00773         else {
00774             draw_group_socket_name(snode, gnode, sock, in_out, offset, 0);
00775             if (stype->buttonfunc)
00776                 stype->buttonfunc(C, gnode->block, ngroup, NULL, sock, "", sock->locx+offset, sock->locy-NODE_DY, colw);
00777         }
00778     }
00779     else {
00780         /* only name, no value button */
00781         if (gsock)
00782             draw_group_socket_name(snode, gnode, gsock, in_out, offset, -NODE_DYS);
00783         else
00784             draw_group_socket_name(snode, gnode, sock, in_out, offset, -NODE_DYS);
00785     }
00786     
00787     if (gsock && (gsock->flag & SOCK_DYNAMIC)) {
00788         /* up/down buttons */
00789         offset = (in_out==SOCK_IN ? col2 : cor2);
00790         uiBlockSetDirection(gnode->block, UI_TOP);
00791         uiBlockBeginAlign(gnode->block);
00792         bt = uiDefIconButO(gnode->block, BUT, "NODE_OT_group_socket_move_up", 0, ICON_TRIA_UP,
00793                            gsock->locx+offset, gsock->locy, arrowbutw, arrowbutw, "");
00794         if (!gsock->prev || !(gsock->prev->flag & SOCK_DYNAMIC))
00795             uiButSetFlag(bt, UI_BUT_DISABLED);
00796         RNA_int_set(uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(bt), "index", index);
00797         RNA_enum_set(uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(bt), "in_out", in_out);
00798         bt = uiDefIconButO(gnode->block, BUT, "NODE_OT_group_socket_move_down", 0, ICON_TRIA_DOWN,
00799                            gsock->locx+offset, gsock->locy-arrowbutw, arrowbutw, arrowbutw, "");
00800         if (!gsock->next || !(gsock->next->flag & SOCK_DYNAMIC))
00801             uiButSetFlag(bt, UI_BUT_DISABLED);
00802         RNA_int_set(uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(bt), "index", index);
00803         RNA_enum_set(uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(bt), "in_out", in_out);
00804         uiBlockEndAlign(gnode->block);
00805         uiBlockSetDirection(gnode->block, 0);
00806         
00807         /* remove button */
00808         offset = (in_out==SOCK_IN ? col3 : cor1);
00809         uiBlockSetEmboss(gnode->block, UI_EMBOSSN);
00810         bt = uiDefIconButO(gnode->block, BUT, "NODE_OT_group_socket_remove", 0, ICON_X,
00811                            gsock->locx+offset, gsock->locy-0.5f*arrowbutw, arrowbutw, arrowbutw, "");
00812         RNA_int_set(uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(bt), "index", index);
00813         RNA_enum_set(uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(bt), "in_out", in_out);
00814         uiBlockSetEmboss(gnode->block, UI_EMBOSS);
00815     }
00816 }
00817 
00818 /* groups are, on creation, centered around 0,0 */
00819 static void node_draw_group(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar, SpaceNode *snode, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *gnode)
00820 {
00821     if (!(gnode->flag & NODE_GROUP_EDIT)) {
00822         node_draw_default(C, ar, snode, ntree, gnode);
00823     }
00824     else {
00825         bNodeTree *ngroup= (bNodeTree *)gnode->id;
00826         bNodeSocket *sock, *gsock;
00827         uiLayout *layout;
00828         PointerRNA ptr;
00829         rctf rect= gnode->totr;
00830         float node_group_frame= U.dpi*NODE_GROUP_FRAME/72;
00831         float group_header= 26*U.dpi/72;
00832         
00833         int index;
00834         
00835         /* backdrop header */
00836         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00837         uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_TOP_RIGHT);
00838         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_NODE_GROUP, 0, -70);
00839         uiDrawBox(GL_POLYGON, rect.xmin-node_group_frame, rect.ymax, rect.xmax+node_group_frame, rect.ymax+group_header, BASIS_RAD);
00840         
00841         /* backdrop body */
00842         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_BACK, -8, -70);
00843         uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_NONE);
00844         uiDrawBox(GL_POLYGON, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, rect.xmax, rect.ymax, BASIS_RAD);
00845     
00846         /* input column */
00847         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_BACK, 10, -50);
00848         uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT);
00849         uiDrawBox(GL_POLYGON, rect.xmin-node_group_frame, rect.ymin, rect.xmin, rect.ymax, BASIS_RAD);
00850     
00851         /* output column */
00852         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_BACK, 10, -50);
00853         uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_BOTTOM_RIGHT);
00854         uiDrawBox(GL_POLYGON, rect.xmax, rect.ymin, rect.xmax+node_group_frame, rect.ymax, BASIS_RAD);
00855     
00856         /* input column separator */
00857         glColor4ub(200, 200, 200, 140);
00858         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00859         glVertex2f(rect.xmin, rect.ymin);
00860         glVertex2f(rect.xmin, rect.ymax);
00861         glEnd();
00862     
00863         /* output column separator */
00864         glColor4ub(200, 200, 200, 140);
00865         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00866         glVertex2f(rect.xmax, rect.ymin);
00867         glVertex2f(rect.xmax, rect.ymax);
00868         glEnd();
00869     
00870         /* group node outline */
00871         uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_ALL);
00872         glColor4ub(200, 200, 200, 140);
00873         glEnable( GL_LINE_SMOOTH );
00874         uiDrawBox(GL_LINE_LOOP, rect.xmin-node_group_frame, rect.ymin, rect.xmax+node_group_frame, rect.ymax+group_header, BASIS_RAD);
00875         glDisable( GL_LINE_SMOOTH );
00876         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00877         
00878         /* backdrop title */
00879         UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT_HI);
00880     
00881         layout = uiBlockLayout(gnode->block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, (short)(rect.xmin+15), (short)(rect.ymax+group_header),
00882                                MIN2((int)(rect.xmax - rect.xmin-18.0f), node_group_frame+20), group_header, UI_GetStyle());
00883         RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_Node, gnode, &ptr);
00884         uiTemplateIDBrowse(layout, (bContext*)C, &ptr, "node_tree", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00885         uiBlockLayoutResolve(gnode->block, NULL, NULL);
00886     
00887         /* draw the internal tree nodes and links */
00888         node_draw_nodetree(C, ar, snode, ngroup);
00889     
00890         /* group sockets */
00891         gsock=ngroup->inputs.first;
00892         sock=gnode->inputs.first;
00893         index = 0;
00894         while (gsock || sock) {
00895             while (sock && !sock->groupsock) {
00896                 draw_group_socket(C, snode, ntree, gnode, sock, NULL, index, SOCK_IN);
00897                 sock = sock->next;
00898             }
00899             while (gsock && (!sock || sock->groupsock!=gsock)) {
00900                 draw_group_socket(C, snode, ntree, gnode, NULL, gsock, index, SOCK_IN);
00901                 gsock = gsock->next;
00902                 ++index;
00903             }
00904             while (sock && gsock && sock->groupsock==gsock) {
00905                 draw_group_socket(C, snode, ntree, gnode, sock, gsock, index, SOCK_IN);
00906                 sock = sock->next;
00907                 gsock = gsock->next;
00908                 ++index;
00909             }
00910         }
00911         gsock=ngroup->outputs.first;
00912         sock=gnode->outputs.first;
00913         index = 0;
00914         while (gsock || sock) {
00915             while (sock && !sock->groupsock) {
00916                 draw_group_socket(C, snode, ntree, gnode, sock, NULL, index, SOCK_OUT);
00917                 sock = sock->next;
00918             }
00919             while (gsock && (!sock || sock->groupsock!=gsock)) {
00920                 draw_group_socket(C, snode, ntree, gnode, NULL, gsock, index, SOCK_OUT);
00921                 gsock = gsock->next;
00922                 ++index;
00923             }
00924             while (sock && gsock && sock->groupsock==gsock) {
00925                 draw_group_socket(C, snode, ntree, gnode, sock, gsock, index, SOCK_OUT);
00926                 sock = sock->next;
00927                 gsock = gsock->next;
00928                 ++index;
00929             }
00930         }
00931         
00932         uiEndBlock(C, gnode->block);
00933         uiDrawBlock(C, gnode->block);
00934         gnode->block= NULL;
00935     }
00936 }
00937 
00938 void node_uifunc_group(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr)
00939 {
00940     uiTemplateIDBrowse(layout, C, ptr, "node_tree", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00941 }
00942 
00943 static void node_common_buts_whileloop(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
00944 {
00945     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "max_iterations", 0, NULL, 0);
00946 }
00947 
00948 static void node_update_frame(const bContext *UNUSED(C), bNodeTree *UNUSED(ntree), bNode *node)
00949 {
00950     float locx, locy;
00951 
00952     /* get "global" coords */
00953     nodeSpaceCoords(node, &locx, &locy);
00954 
00955     node->prvr.xmin = locx + NODE_DYS;
00956     node->prvr.xmax = locx + node->width- NODE_DYS;
00957 
00958     node->totr.xmin = locx;
00959     node->totr.xmax = locx + node->width;
00960     node->totr.ymax = locy;
00961     node->totr.ymin = locy - node->height;
00962 }
00963 
00964 static void node_common_set_butfunc(bNodeType *ntype)
00965 {
00966     switch(ntype->type) {
00967         case NODE_GROUP:
00968             ntype->uifunc= node_uifunc_group;
00969             ntype->drawfunc= node_draw_group;
00970             ntype->drawupdatefunc= node_update_group;
00971             break;
00972         case NODE_FORLOOP:
00973 //          ntype->uifunc= node_common_buts_group;
00974             ntype->drawfunc= node_draw_group;
00975             ntype->drawupdatefunc= node_update_group;
00976             break;
00977         case NODE_WHILELOOP:
00978             ntype->uifunc= node_common_buts_whileloop;
00979             ntype->drawfunc= node_draw_group;
00980             ntype->drawupdatefunc= node_update_group;
00981             break;
00982         case NODE_FRAME:
00983             ntype->drawupdatefunc= node_update_frame;
00984             break;
00985     }
00986 }

00988 /* ****************** BUTTON CALLBACKS FOR SHADER NODES ***************** */
00989 
00990 static void node_browse_text_cb(bContext *C, void *ntree_v, void *node_v)
00991 {
00992     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00993     bNodeTree *ntree= ntree_v;
00994     bNode *node= node_v;
00995     /* ID *oldid; */ /* UNUSED */
00996     
00997     if (node->menunr<1) return;
00998     
00999     if (node->id) {
01000         node->id->us--;
01001     }
01002     /* oldid= node->id; */ /* UNUSED */
01003     node->id= BLI_findlink(&bmain->text, node->menunr-1);
01004     id_us_plus(node->id);
01005     BLI_strncpy(node->name, node->id->name+2, sizeof(node->name));
01006 
01007     node->custom1= BSET(node->custom1, NODE_DYNAMIC_NEW);
01008     
01009     nodeSetActive(ntree, node);
01010 
01011     // allqueue(REDRAWBUTSSHADING, 0);
01012     // allqueue(REDRAWNODE, 0);
01013 
01014     node->menunr= 0;
01015 }

01062 static void node_shader_buts_geometry(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr)

01074     }
01075     else {
01076         uiItemR(col, ptr, "uv_layer", 0, "UV", ICON_NONE);
01077         uiItemR(col, ptr, "color_layer", 0, "VCol", ICON_NONE);
01078     }
01079 }

01135 
01136 static void node_shader_buts_dynamic(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr)
01137 { 
01138     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
01139     uiBlock *block= uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(layout);
01140     bNode *node= ptr->data;
01141     bNodeTree *ntree= ptr->id.data;
01142     rctf *butr= &node->butr;
01143     uiBut *bt;
01144     // XXX SpaceNode *snode= curarea->spacedata.first;
01145     short dy= (short)butr->ymin;
01146     int xoff=0;
01147 
01148     /* B_NODE_EXEC is handled in butspace.c do_node_buts */
01149     if (!node->id) {
01150             const char *strp;
01151             IDnames_to_pupstring(&strp, NULL, "", &(bmain->text), NULL, NULL);
01152             node->menunr= 0;
01153             bt= uiDefButS(block, MENU, B_NODE_EXEC/*+node->nr*/, strp, 
01154                             butr->xmin, dy, 19, 19, 
01155                             &node->menunr, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Browses existing choices");
01156             uiButSetFunc(bt, node_browse_text_cb, ntree, node);
01157             xoff=19;
01158             if (strp) MEM_freeN((void *)strp);
01159     }
01160     else {
01161         bt = uiDefBut(block, BUT, B_NOP, "Update",
01162                 butr->xmin+xoff, butr->ymin+20, 50, 19,
01163                 &node->menunr, 0.0, 19.0, 0, 0, "Refresh this node (and all others that use the same script)");
01164         uiButSetFunc(bt, node_dynamic_update_cb, ntree, node);
01165 
01166         if (BTST(node->custom1, NODE_DYNAMIC_ERROR)) {
01167             // UI_ThemeColor(TH_REDALERT);
01168             // XXX ui_rasterpos_safe(butr->xmin + xoff, butr->ymin + 5, snode->aspect);
01169             // XXX snode_drawstring(snode, "Error! Check console...", butr->xmax - butr->xmin);
01170             ;
01171         }
01172     }
01173 }
01174 
01175 /* only once called */
01176 static void node_shader_set_butfunc(bNodeType *ntype)
01177 {
01178     ntype->uifuncbut = NULL;
01179     switch(ntype->type) {
01180         /* case NODE_GROUP:  note, typeinfo for group is generated... see "XXX ugly hack" */
01181 
01182         case SH_NODE_MATERIAL:
01183         case SH_NODE_MATERIAL_EXT:
01184             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_material;
01185             break;
01186         case SH_NODE_TEXTURE:
01187             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_texture;
01188             break;
01189         case SH_NODE_NORMAL:
01190             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_normal;
01191             break;
01192         case SH_NODE_CURVE_VEC:
01193             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_curvevec;
01194             break;
01195         case SH_NODE_CURVE_RGB:
01196             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_curvecol;
01197             break;
01198         case SH_NODE_MAPPING:
01199             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_mapping;
01200             break;
01201         case SH_NODE_VALUE:
01202             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_value;
01203             break;
01204         case SH_NODE_RGB:
01205             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_rgb;
01206             break;
01207         case SH_NODE_MIX_RGB:
01208             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_mix_rgb;
01209             break;
01210         case SH_NODE_VALTORGB:
01211             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_colorramp;
01212             break;
01213         case SH_NODE_MATH: 
01214             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_math;
01215             break; 
01216         case SH_NODE_VECT_MATH: 
01217             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_vect_math;
01218             break; 
01219         case SH_NODE_GEOMETRY:
01220             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_geometry;
01221             break;
01222         case SH_NODE_ATTRIBUTE:
01223             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_attribute;
01224             break;
01225         case SH_NODE_TEX_SKY:
01226             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_tex_sky;
01227             break;
01228         case SH_NODE_TEX_IMAGE:
01229             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_tex_image;
01230             break;
01231         case SH_NODE_TEX_ENVIRONMENT:
01232             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_tex_environment;
01233             break;
01234         case SH_NODE_TEX_GRADIENT:
01235             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_tex_gradient;
01236             break;
01237         case SH_NODE_TEX_MAGIC:
01238             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_tex_magic;
01239             break;
01240         case SH_NODE_TEX_WAVE:
01241             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_tex_wave;
01242             break;
01243         case SH_NODE_TEX_MUSGRAVE:
01244             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_tex_musgrave;
01245             break;
01246         case SH_NODE_TEX_VORONOI:
01247             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_tex_voronoi;
01248             break;
01249         case SH_NODE_BSDF_GLOSSY:
01250         case SH_NODE_BSDF_GLASS:
01251             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_glossy;
01252             break;
01253         case NODE_DYNAMIC:
01254             ntype->uifunc= node_shader_buts_dynamic;
01255             break;
01256     }
01257         if (ntype->uifuncbut == NULL) ntype->uifuncbut = ntype->uifunc;
01258 }
01259 
01260 /* ****************** BUTTON CALLBACKS FOR COMPOSITE NODES ***************** */
01261 
01262 static void node_composit_buts_image(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr)
01263 {
01264     uiLayout *col;
01265     bNode *node= ptr->data;
01266     PointerRNA imaptr;
01267     PropertyRNA *prop;
01268     int source;
01269     
01270     uiTemplateID(layout, C, ptr, "image", NULL, "IMAGE_OT_open", NULL);
01271     
01272     if (!node->id) return;
01273     
01274     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, "image");
01275     if (!prop || RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_POINTER) return;
01276     imaptr= RNA_property_pointer_get(ptr, prop);
01277     
01278     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
01279     
01280     uiItemR(col, &imaptr, "source", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01281     
01282     source= RNA_enum_get(&imaptr, "source");
01283 
01284     if (source == IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE) {
01285         /* don't use iuser->framenr directly because it may not be updated if auto-refresh is off */
01286         Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01287         ImageUser *iuser= node->storage;
01288         char numstr[32];
01289         const int framenr= BKE_image_user_get_frame(iuser, CFRA, 0);
01290         BLI_snprintf(numstr, sizeof(numstr), "Frame: %d", framenr);
01291         uiItemL(layout, numstr, ICON_NONE);
01292     }
01293 
01294     if (ELEM(source, IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE, IMA_SRC_MOVIE)) {
01295         col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
01296         uiItemR(col, ptr, "frame_duration", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01297         uiItemR(col, ptr, "frame_start", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01298         uiItemR(col, ptr, "frame_offset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01299         uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_cyclic", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01300         uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_auto_refresh", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01301     }
01302 
01303     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
01304     
01305     if (RNA_enum_get(&imaptr, "type")== IMA_TYPE_MULTILAYER)
01306         uiItemR(col, ptr, "layer", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01307 }
01308 
01309 static void node_composit_buts_renderlayers(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr)
01310 {
01311     bNode *node= ptr->data;
01312     uiLayout *col, *row;
01313     PointerRNA op_ptr;
01314     PointerRNA scn_ptr;
01315     PropertyRNA *prop;
01316     const char *layer_name;
01317     char scene_name[MAX_ID_NAME-2];
01318     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find("RENDER_OT_render", 1);
01319 
01320     BLI_assert(ot != 0);
01321 
01322     uiTemplateID(layout, C, ptr, "scene", NULL, NULL, NULL);
01323     
01324     if (!node->id) return;
01325 
01326     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
01327     row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
01328     uiItemR(row, ptr, "layer", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
01329     
01330     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, "layer");
01331     if (!(RNA_property_enum_identifier(C, ptr, prop, RNA_property_enum_get(ptr, prop), &layer_name)))
01332         return;
01333     
01334     scn_ptr = RNA_pointer_get(ptr, "scene");
01335     RNA_string_get(&scn_ptr, "name", scene_name);
01336     
01337     WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(&op_ptr, ot);
01338     RNA_string_set(&op_ptr, "layer", layer_name);
01339     RNA_string_set(&op_ptr, "scene", scene_name);
01340     uiItemFullO_ptr(row, ot, "", ICON_RENDER_STILL, op_ptr.data, WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, 0);
01341 
01342 }
01343

01345 static void node_composit_buts_blur(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
01346 {
01347     uiLayout *col, *row;
01348     
01349     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
01350     
01351     uiItemR(col, ptr, "filter_type", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
01352     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "filter_type")!= R_FILTER_FAST_GAUSS) {
01353         uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_bokeh", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01354         uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_gamma_correction", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01355     }
01356     
01357     uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_relative", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01358     
01359     if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_relative")) {
01360         uiItemL(col, "Aspect Correction", 0);
01361         row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
01362         uiItemR(row, ptr, "aspect_correction", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, 0);
01363         
01364         col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
01365         uiItemR(col, ptr, "factor_x", 0, "X", ICON_NONE);
01366         uiItemR(col, ptr, "factor_y", 0, "Y", ICON_NONE);
01367     }
01368     else {
01369         col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
01370         uiItemR(col, ptr, "size_x", 0, "X", ICON_NONE);
01371         uiItemR(col, ptr, "size_y", 0, "Y", ICON_NONE);
01372     }
01373 }

01440 /* qdn: glare node */
01441 static void node_composit_buts_glare(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
01442 {   
01443     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "glare_type", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
01444     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "quality", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
01445 
01446     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "glare_type")!= 1) {
01447         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "iterations", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01448     
01449         if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "glare_type")!= 0) 
01450             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "color_modulation", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01451     }
01452     
01453     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mix", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01454     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "threshold", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01455 
01456     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "glare_type")== 2) {
01457         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "streaks", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01458         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "angle_offset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01459     }
01460     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "glare_type")== 0 || RNA_enum_get(ptr, "glare_type")== 2) {
01461         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "fade", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01462         
01463         if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "glare_type")== 0) 
01464             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "use_rotate_45", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01465     }
01466     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "glare_type")== 1) {
01467         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "size", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01468     }
01469 }

01573 static void node_composit_buts_map_value(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
01574 {
01575     uiLayout *sub, *col;
01576     
01577     col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
01578     uiItemR(col, ptr, "offset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01579     uiItemR(col, ptr, "size", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);

01582     uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_min", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01583     sub = uiLayoutColumn(col, 0);

01585     uiItemR(sub, ptr, "min", 0, "", ICON_NONE);

01741 static void node_composit_buts_file_output(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
01742 {
01743     PointerRNA imfptr = RNA_pointer_get(ptr, "format");
01744     int multilayer = (RNA_enum_get(&imfptr, "file_format") == R_IMF_IMTYPE_MULTILAYER);
01745     
01746     if (multilayer)
01747         uiItemL(layout, "Path:", 0);
01748     else
01749         uiItemL(layout, "Base Path:", 0);
01750     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "base_path", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
01751 }
01752 static void node_composit_buts_file_output_details(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr)
01753 {
01754     PointerRNA imfptr = RNA_pointer_get(ptr, "format");
01755     PointerRNA active_input_ptr = RNA_pointer_get(ptr, "active_input");
01756     int multilayer = (RNA_enum_get(&imfptr, "file_format") == R_IMF_IMTYPE_MULTILAYER);
01757     
01758     node_composit_buts_file_output(layout, C, ptr);
01759     uiTemplateImageSettings(layout, &imfptr);
01760     
01761     uiItemS(layout);
01762     
01763     uiItemO(layout, "Add Input", ICON_ZOOMIN, "NODE_OT_output_file_add_socket");
01764     
01765     uiTemplateList(layout, C, ptr, "inputs", ptr, "active_input_index", NULL, 0, 0, 0);
01766     
01767     if (active_input_ptr.data) {
01768         uiLayout *row, *col;
01769         
01770         col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
01771         if (multilayer)
01772             uiItemL(col, "Layer Name:", 0);
01773         else
01774             uiItemL(col, "File Path:", 0);
01775         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
01776         uiItemR(row, &active_input_ptr, "name", 0, "", 0);
01777         uiItemFullO(row, "NODE_OT_output_file_remove_active_socket", "", ICON_X, NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY);
01778         
01779         /* in multilayer format all socket format details are ignored */
01780         if (!multilayer) {
01781             imfptr = RNA_pointer_get(&active_input_ptr, "format");
01782             
01783             col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
01784             uiItemL(col, "Format:", 0);
01785             uiItemR(col, &active_input_ptr, "use_node_format", 0, NULL, 0);
01786             
01787             col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
01788             uiLayoutSetActive(col, RNA_boolean_get(&active_input_ptr, "use_node_format")==0);
01789             uiTemplateImageSettings(col, &imfptr);
01790         }
01791     }
01792 }

01823 static void node_composit_buts_colorbalance(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
01824 {
01825     uiLayout *split, *col, *row;
01826     
01827     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "correction_method", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01828     
01829     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "correction_method")== 0) {
01830     
01831         split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
01832         col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01833         uiTemplateColorWheel(col, ptr, "lift", 1, 1, 0, 1);
01834         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
01835         uiItemR(row, ptr, "lift", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01836         
01837         col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01838         uiTemplateColorWheel(col, ptr, "gamma", 1, 1, 1, 1);
01839         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
01840         uiItemR(row, ptr, "gamma", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01841         
01842         col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01843         uiTemplateColorWheel(col, ptr, "gain", 1, 1, 1, 1);
01844         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
01845         uiItemR(row, ptr, "gain", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01846 
01847     }
01848     else {
01849         
01850         split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
01851         col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01852         uiTemplateColorWheel(col, ptr, "offset", 1, 1, 0, 1);
01853         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
01854         uiItemR(row, ptr, "offset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01855         
01856         col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01857         uiTemplateColorWheel(col, ptr, "power", 1, 1, 0, 1);
01858         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
01859         uiItemR(row, ptr, "power", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01860         
01861         col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01862         uiTemplateColorWheel(col, ptr, "slope", 1, 1, 0, 1);
01863         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
01864         uiItemR(row, ptr, "slope", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01865     }
01866 
01867 }
01868 static void node_composit_buts_colorbalance_but(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
01869 {
01870     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "correction_method", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01871 
01872     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "correction_method")== 0) {
01873 
01874     uiTemplateColorWheel(layout, ptr, "lift", 1, 1, 0, 1);
01875         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "lift", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01876 
01877         uiTemplateColorWheel(layout, ptr, "gamma", 1, 1, 1, 1);
01878         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "gamma", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01879 
01880         uiTemplateColorWheel(layout, ptr, "gain", 1, 1, 1, 1);
01881         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "gain", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01882     }
01883     else {
01884         uiTemplateColorWheel(layout, ptr, "offset", 1, 1, 0, 1);
01885         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "offset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01886 
01887         uiTemplateColorWheel(layout, ptr, "power", 1, 1, 0, 1);
01888         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "power", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01889 
01890         uiTemplateColorWheel(layout, ptr, "slope", 1, 1, 0, 1);
01891         uiItemR(layout, ptr, "slope", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01892     }
01893 }

01940 /* only once called */
01941 static void node_composit_set_butfunc(bNodeType *ntype)
01942 {
01943     ntype->uifuncbut = NULL;
01944     switch(ntype->type) {
01945         /* case NODE_GROUP:  note, typeinfo for group is generated... see "XXX ugly hack" */
01946 
01947         case CMP_NODE_IMAGE:
01948             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_image;
01949             break;
01950         case CMP_NODE_R_LAYERS:
01951             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_renderlayers;
01952             break;
01953         case CMP_NODE_NORMAL:
01954             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_normal;
01955             break;
01956         case CMP_NODE_CURVE_VEC:
01957             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_curvevec;
01958             break;
01959         case CMP_NODE_CURVE_RGB:
01960             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_curvecol;
01961             break;
01962         case CMP_NODE_VALUE:
01963             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_value;
01964             break;
01965         case CMP_NODE_RGB:
01966             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_rgb;
01967             break;
01968         case CMP_NODE_FLIP:
01969             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_flip;
01970             break;
01971         case CMP_NODE_SPLITVIEWER:
01972             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_splitviewer;
01973             break;
01974         case CMP_NODE_MIX_RGB:
01975             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_mix_rgb;
01976             break;
01977         case CMP_NODE_VALTORGB:
01978             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_colorramp;
01979             break;
01980         case CMP_NODE_CROP:
01981             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_crop;
01982             break;
01983         case CMP_NODE_BLUR:
01984             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_blur;
01985             break;
01986         case CMP_NODE_DBLUR:
01987             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_dblur;
01988             break;
01989         case CMP_NODE_BILATERALBLUR:
01990             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_bilateralblur;
01991             break;
01992         case CMP_NODE_DEFOCUS:
01993             ntype->uifunc = node_composit_buts_defocus;
01994             break;
01995         case CMP_NODE_GLARE:
01996             ntype->uifunc = node_composit_buts_glare;
01997             break;
01998         case CMP_NODE_TONEMAP:
01999             ntype->uifunc = node_composit_buts_tonemap;
02000             break;
02001         case CMP_NODE_LENSDIST:
02002             ntype->uifunc = node_composit_buts_lensdist;
02003             break;
02004         case CMP_NODE_VECBLUR:
02005             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_vecblur;
02006             break;
02007         case CMP_NODE_FILTER:
02008             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_filter;
02009             break;
02010         case CMP_NODE_MAP_VALUE:
02011             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_map_value;
02012             break;
02013         case CMP_NODE_TIME:
02014             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_time;
02015             break;
02016         case CMP_NODE_ALPHAOVER:
02017             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_alphaover;
02018             break;
02019         case CMP_NODE_HUE_SAT:
02020             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_hue_sat;
02021             break;
02022         case CMP_NODE_TEXTURE:
02023             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_texture;
02024             break;
02025         case CMP_NODE_DILATEERODE:
02026             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_dilateerode;

02083             break;

02096             break;
02097         case CMP_NODE_STABILIZE2D:
02098             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_stabilize2d;
02099             break;
02100         case CMP_NODE_TRANSFORM:
02101             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_transform;
02102             break;
02103         case CMP_NODE_MOVIEDISTORTION:
02104             ntype->uifunc= node_composit_buts_moviedistortion;
02105             break;
02106         default:
02107             ntype->uifunc= NULL;
02108     }
02109     if (ntype->uifuncbut == NULL) ntype->uifuncbut = ntype->uifunc;
02110 
02111 }
02112 
02113 /* ****************** BUTTON CALLBACKS FOR TEXTURE NODES ***************** */

02115 static void node_texture_buts_bricks(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
02116 {
02117     uiLayout *col;
02118     
02119     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
02120     uiItemR(col, ptr, "offset", 0, "Offset", ICON_NONE);
02121     uiItemR(col, ptr, "offset_frequency", 0, "Frequency", ICON_NONE);
02122     
02123     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
02124     uiItemR(col, ptr, "squash", 0, "Squash", ICON_NONE);
02125     uiItemR(col, ptr, "squash_frequency", 0, "Frequency", ICON_NONE);
02126 }
02127 
02128 static void node_texture_buts_proc(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), PointerRNA *ptr)
02129 {
02130     PointerRNA tex_ptr;
02131     bNode *node= ptr->data;
02132     ID *id= ptr->id.data;
02133     Tex *tex = (Tex *)node->storage;
02134     uiLayout *col, *row;
02135     
02136     RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_Texture, tex, &tex_ptr);
02137 
02138     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
02139 
02140     switch( tex->type ) {
02141         case TEX_BLEND:
02142             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "progression", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02143             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02144             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "use_flip_axis", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02145             break;
02146 
02147         case TEX_MARBLE:
02148             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02149             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "marble_type", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02150             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02151             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "noise_type", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02152             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02153             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "noise_basis", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02154             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02155             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "noise_basis_2", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02156             break;
02157 
02158         case TEX_MAGIC:
02159             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "noise_depth", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02160             break;
02161 
02162         case TEX_STUCCI:
02163             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02164             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "stucci_type", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02165             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02166             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "noise_type", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02167             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "noise_basis", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02168             break;
02169 
02170         case TEX_WOOD:
02171             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "noise_basis", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02172             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "wood_type", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02173             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02174             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "noise_basis_2", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02175             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02176             uiLayoutSetActive(row, !(RNA_enum_get(&tex_ptr, "wood_type")==TEX_BAND || RNA_enum_get(&tex_ptr, "wood_type")==TEX_RING)); 
02177             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "noise_type", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02178             break;
02179             
02180         case TEX_CLOUDS:
02181             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "noise_basis", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02182             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02183             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "cloud_type", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02184             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
02185             uiItemR(row, &tex_ptr, "noise_type", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02186             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "noise_depth", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, "Depth", ICON_NONE);
02187             break;
02188             
02189         case TEX_DISTNOISE:
02190             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "noise_basis", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02191             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "noise_distortion", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02192             break;
02193 
02194         case TEX_MUSGRAVE:
02195             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "musgrave_type", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02196             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "noise_basis", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02197             break;
02198         case TEX_VORONOI:
02199             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "distance_metric", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02200             if (tex->vn_distm == TEX_MINKOVSKY) {
02201                 uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "minkovsky_exponent", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
02202             }
02203             uiItemR(col, &tex_ptr, "color_mode", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
02204             break;
02205     }
02206 }

02218 /* only once called */
02219 static void node_texture_set_butfunc(bNodeType *ntype)
02220 {
02221     ntype->uifuncbut = NULL;
02222     if ( ntype->type >= TEX_NODE_PROC && ntype->type < TEX_NODE_PROC_MAX ) {
02223         ntype->uifunc = node_texture_buts_proc;
02224     }
02225     else switch(ntype->type) {
02226         
02227         case TEX_NODE_MATH:
02228             ntype->uifunc = node_buts_math;
02229             break;
02230         
02231         case TEX_NODE_MIX_RGB:
02232             ntype->uifunc = node_buts_mix_rgb;
02233             break;
02234             
02235         case TEX_NODE_VALTORGB:
02236             ntype->uifunc = node_buts_colorramp;
02237             break;
02238             
02239         case TEX_NODE_CURVE_RGB:
02240             ntype->uifunc= node_buts_curvecol;
02241             break;
02242             
02243         case TEX_NODE_CURVE_TIME:
02244             ntype->uifunc = node_buts_time;
02245             break;
02246             
02247         case TEX_NODE_TEXTURE:
02248             ntype->uifunc = node_buts_texture;
02249             break;
02250             
02251         case TEX_NODE_BRICKS:
02252             ntype->uifunc = node_texture_buts_bricks;
02253             break;
02254             
02255         case TEX_NODE_IMAGE:
02256             ntype->uifunc = node_texture_buts_image;
02257             break;
02258             
02259         case TEX_NODE_OUTPUT:
02260             ntype->uifunc = node_texture_buts_output;
02261             break;
02262     }
02263     if (ntype->uifuncbut == NULL) ntype->uifuncbut = ntype->uifunc;
02264 }
02265 
02266 /* ******* init draw callbacks for all tree types, only called in usiblender.c, once ************* */
02267 
02268 void ED_init_node_butfuncs(void)
02269 {
02270     bNodeTreeType *treetype;
02271     bNodeType *ntype;
02272     bNodeSocketType *stype;
02273     int i;
02274     
02275     /* node type ui functions */
02276     for (i=0; i < NUM_NTREE_TYPES; ++i) {
02277         treetype = ntreeGetType(i);
02278         if (treetype) {
02279             for (ntype= treetype->node_types.first; ntype; ntype= ntype->next) {
02280                 /* default ui functions */
02281                 ntype->drawfunc = node_draw_default;
02282                 ntype->drawupdatefunc = node_update_default;
02283                 ntype->uifunc = NULL;
02284                 ntype->uifuncbut = NULL;
02285                 ntype->resize_area_func = node_resize_area_default;
02286                 
02287                 node_common_set_butfunc(ntype);
02288                 
02289                 switch (i) {
02290                 case NTREE_COMPOSIT:
02291                     node_composit_set_butfunc(ntype);
02292                     break;
02293                 case NTREE_SHADER:
02294                     node_shader_set_butfunc(ntype);
02295                     break;
02296                 case NTREE_TEXTURE:
02297                     node_texture_set_butfunc(ntype);
02298                     break;
02299                 }
02300             }
02301         }
02302     }
02303     
02304     /* socket type ui functions */
02305     for (i=0; i < NUM_SOCKET_TYPES; ++i) {
02306         stype = ntreeGetSocketType(i);
02307         if (stype) {
02308             switch(stype->type) {
02309             case SOCK_FLOAT:
02310             case SOCK_INT:
02311             case SOCK_BOOLEAN:
02312                 stype->buttonfunc = node_socket_button_default;
02313                 break;
02314             case SOCK_VECTOR:
02315                 stype->buttonfunc = node_socket_button_components;
02316                 break;
02317             case SOCK_RGBA:
02318                 stype->buttonfunc = node_socket_button_color;
02319                 break;
02320             case SOCK_SHADER:
02321                 stype->buttonfunc = node_socket_button_label;
02322                 break;
02323             default:
02324                 stype->buttonfunc = NULL;
02325             }
02326         }
02327     }
02328 }
02329 
02330 /* ************** Generic drawing ************** */
02331 
02332 void draw_nodespace_back_pix(ARegion *ar, SpaceNode *snode, int color_manage)
02333 {
02334     
02335     if ((snode->flag & SNODE_BACKDRAW) && snode->treetype==NTREE_COMPOSIT) {
02336         Image *ima= BKE_image_verify_viewer(IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE, "Viewer Node");
02337         void *lock;
02338         ImBuf *ibuf= BKE_image_acquire_ibuf(ima, NULL, &lock);
02339         if (ibuf) {
02340             float x, y; 
02341             
02342             glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
02343             glPushMatrix();
02344             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
02345             glPushMatrix();
02346 
02347             /* keep this, saves us from a version patch */
02348             if (snode->zoom==0.0f) snode->zoom= 1.0f;
02349             
02350             /* somehow the offset has to be calculated inverse */
02351             
02352             glaDefine2DArea(&ar->winrct);
02353             /* ortho at pixel level curarea */
02354             wmOrtho2(-0.375, ar->winx-0.375, -0.375, ar->winy-0.375);
02355             
02356             x = (ar->winx-snode->zoom*ibuf->x)/2 + snode->xof;
02357             y = (ar->winy-snode->zoom*ibuf->y)/2 + snode->yof;
02358             
02359             if (!ibuf->rect) {
02360                 if (color_manage)
02361                     ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
02362                 else
02363                     ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_NONE;
02364                 IMB_rect_from_float(ibuf);
02365             }
02366 
02367             if (ibuf->rect) {
02368                 if (snode->flag & SNODE_SHOW_ALPHA) {
02369                     glPixelZoom(snode->zoom, snode->zoom);
02370                     /* swap bytes, so alpha is most significant one, then just draw it as luminance int */
02371                     if (ENDIAN_ORDER == B_ENDIAN)
02372                         glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_SWAP_BYTES, 1);
02373                     
02374                     glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, GL_LUMINANCE, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, ibuf->rect);
02375                     
02376                     glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_SWAP_BYTES, 0);
02377                     glPixelZoom(1.0f, 1.0f);
02378                 }
02379                 else if (snode->flag & SNODE_USE_ALPHA) {
02380                     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02381                     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
02382                     glPixelZoom(snode->zoom, snode->zoom);
02383                     
02384                     glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, ibuf->rect);
02385                     
02386                     glPixelZoom(1.0f, 1.0f);
02387                     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02388                 }
02389                 else {
02390                     glPixelZoom(snode->zoom, snode->zoom);
02391                     
02392                     glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, ibuf->rect);
02393                     
02394                     glPixelZoom(1.0f, 1.0f);
02395                 }
02396             }
02397             
02398             glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
02399             glPopMatrix();
02400             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
02401             glPopMatrix();
02402         }
02403 
02404         BKE_image_release_ibuf(ima, lock);
02405     }
02406 }
02407 
02408 #if 0
02409 /* note: needs to be userpref or opengl profile option */
02410 static void draw_nodespace_back_tex(ScrArea *sa, SpaceNode *snode)
02411 {
02412 
02413     draw_nodespace_grid(snode);
02414     
02415     if (snode->flag & SNODE_BACKDRAW) {
02416         Image *ima= BKE_image_verify_viewer(IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE, "Viewer Node");
02417         ImBuf *ibuf= BKE_image_get_ibuf(ima, NULL);
02418         if (ibuf) {
02419             int x, y;
02420             float zoom = 1.0;
02421 
02422             glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
02423             glPushMatrix();
02424             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
02425             glPushMatrix();
02426             
02427             glaDefine2DArea(&sa->winrct);
02428 
02429             if (ibuf->x > sa->winx || ibuf->y > sa->winy) {
02430                 float zoomx, zoomy;
02431                 zoomx= (float)sa->winx/ibuf->x;
02432                 zoomy= (float)sa->winy/ibuf->y;
02433                 zoom = MIN2(zoomx, zoomy);
02434             }
02435             
02436             x = (sa->winx-zoom*ibuf->x)/2 + snode->xof;
02437             y = (sa->winy-zoom*ibuf->y)/2 + snode->yof;
02438 
02439             glPixelZoom(zoom, zoom);
02440 
02441             glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
02442             if (ibuf->rect)
02443                 glaDrawPixelsTex(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, ibuf->rect);
02444             else if (ibuf->channels==4)
02445                 glaDrawPixelsTex(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, GL_FLOAT, ibuf->rect_float);
02446 
02447             glPixelZoom(1.0, 1.0);
02448 
02449             glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
02450             glPopMatrix();
02451             glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
02452             glPopMatrix();
02453         }
02454     }
02455 }
02456 #endif
02457 
02458 /* if v2d not NULL, it clips and returns 0 if not visible */
02459 int node_link_bezier_points(View2D *v2d, SpaceNode *snode, bNodeLink *link, float coord_array[][2], int resol)
02460 {
02461     float dist, vec[4][2];
02462     
02463     /* in v0 and v3 we put begin/end points */
02464     if (link->fromsock) {
02465         vec[0][0]= link->fromsock->locx;
02466         vec[0][1]= link->fromsock->locy;
02467     }
02468     else {
02469         if (snode==NULL) return 0;
02470         vec[0][0]= snode->mx;
02471         vec[0][1]= snode->my;
02472     }
02473     if (link->tosock) {
02474         vec[3][0]= link->tosock->locx;
02475         vec[3][1]= link->tosock->locy;
02476     }
02477     else {
02478         if (snode==NULL) return 0;
02479         vec[3][0]= snode->mx;
02480         vec[3][1]= snode->my;
02481     }
02482 
02483     dist= UI_GetThemeValue(TH_NODE_CURVING)*0.10f*ABS(vec[0][0] - vec[3][0]);
02484     
02485     /* check direction later, for top sockets */
02486     vec[1][0]= vec[0][0]+dist;
02487     vec[1][1]= vec[0][1];
02488     
02489     vec[2][0]= vec[3][0]-dist;
02490     vec[2][1]= vec[3][1];
02491     
02492     if (v2d && MIN4(vec[0][0], vec[1][0], vec[2][0], vec[3][0]) > v2d->cur.xmax); /* clipped */
02493     else if (v2d && MAX4(vec[0][0], vec[1][0], vec[2][0], vec[3][0]) < v2d->cur.xmin); /* clipped */
02494     else {
02495         
02496         /* always do all three, to prevent data hanging around */
02497         forward_diff_bezier(vec[0][0], vec[1][0], vec[2][0], vec[3][0], coord_array[0], resol, sizeof(float)*2);
02498         forward_diff_bezier(vec[0][1], vec[1][1], vec[2][1], vec[3][1], coord_array[0]+1, resol, sizeof(float)*2);
02499         
02500         return 1;
02501     }
02502     return 0;
02503 }
02504 
02505 #define LINK_RESOL  24
02506 void node_draw_link_bezier(View2D *v2d, SpaceNode *snode, bNodeLink *link, int th_col1, int do_shaded, int th_col2, int do_triple, int th_col3 )
02507 {
02508     float coord_array[LINK_RESOL+1][2];
02509     
02510     if (node_link_bezier_points(v2d, snode, link, coord_array, LINK_RESOL)) {
02511         float dist, spline_step = 0.0f;
02512         int i;
02513         
02514         /* store current linewidth */
02515         float linew;
02516         glGetFloatv(GL_LINE_WIDTH, &linew);
02517         
02518         /* we can reuse the dist variable here to increment the GL curve eval amount*/
02519         dist = 1.0f/(float)LINK_RESOL;
02520         
02521         glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
02522         
02523         if (do_triple) {
02524             UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(th_col3, -80, -120);
02525             glLineWidth(4.0f);
02526             
02527             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
02528             for (i=0; i<=LINK_RESOL; i++) {
02529                 glVertex2fv(coord_array[i]);
02530             }
02531             glEnd();
02532         }
02533         
02534         /* XXX using GL_LINES for shaded node lines is a workaround
02535          * for Intel hardware, this breaks with GL_LINE_STRIP and
02536          * changing color in begin/end blocks.
02537          */
02538         glLineWidth(1.5f);
02539         if (do_shaded) {
02540             glBegin(GL_LINES);
02541             for (i=0; i<LINK_RESOL; i++) {
02542                 UI_ThemeColorBlend(th_col1, th_col2, spline_step);
02543                 glVertex2fv(coord_array[i]);
02544                 
02545                 UI_ThemeColorBlend(th_col1, th_col2, spline_step+dist);
02546                 glVertex2fv(coord_array[i+1]);
02547                 
02548                 spline_step += dist;
02549             }
02550             glEnd();
02551         }
02552         else {
02553             UI_ThemeColor(th_col1);
02554             glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
02555             for (i=0; i<=LINK_RESOL; i++) {
02556                 glVertex2fv(coord_array[i]);
02557             }
02558             glEnd();
02559         }
02560         
02561         glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
02562         
02563         /* restore previuos linewidth */
02564         glLineWidth(linew);
02565     }
02566 }
02567 
02568 static void node_link_straight_points(View2D *UNUSED(v2d), SpaceNode *snode, bNodeLink *link, float coord_array[][2])
02569 {
02570     if (link->fromsock) {
02571         coord_array[0][0]= link->fromsock->locx;
02572         coord_array[0][1]= link->fromsock->locy;
02573     }
02574     else {
02575         if (snode==NULL) return;
02576         coord_array[0][0]= snode->mx;
02577         coord_array[0][1]= snode->my;
02578     }
02579     if (link->tosock) {
02580         coord_array[1][0]= link->tosock->locx;
02581         coord_array[1][1]= link->tosock->locy;
02582     }
02583     else {
02584         if (snode==NULL) return;
02585         coord_array[1][0]= snode->mx;
02586         coord_array[1][1]= snode->my;
02587     }
02588 }
02589 
02590 void node_draw_link_straight(View2D *v2d, SpaceNode *snode, bNodeLink *link, int th_col1, int do_shaded, int th_col2, int do_triple, int th_col3 )
02591 {
02592     float coord_array[2][2];
02593     float linew;
02594     int i;
02595     
02596     node_link_straight_points(v2d, snode, link, coord_array);
02597     
02598     /* store current linewidth */
02599     glGetFloatv(GL_LINE_WIDTH, &linew);
02600     
02601     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
02602     
02603     if (do_triple) {
02604         UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(th_col3, -80, -120);
02605         glLineWidth(4.0f);
02606         
02607         glBegin(GL_LINES);
02608         glVertex2fv(coord_array[0]);
02609         glVertex2fv(coord_array[1]);
02610         glEnd();
02611     }
02612     
02613     UI_ThemeColor(th_col1);
02614     glLineWidth(1.5f);
02615     
02616     /* XXX using GL_LINES for shaded node lines is a workaround
02617      * for Intel hardware, this breaks with GL_LINE_STRIP and
02618      * changing color in begin/end blocks.
02619      */
02620     if (do_shaded) {
02621         glBegin(GL_LINES);
02622         for (i=0; i < LINK_RESOL-1; ++i) {
02623             float t= (float)i/(float)(LINK_RESOL-1);
02624             UI_ThemeColorBlend(th_col1, th_col2, t);
02625             glVertex2f((1.0f-t)*coord_array[0][0]+t*coord_array[1][0], (1.0f-t)*coord_array[0][1]+t*coord_array[1][1]);
02626             
02627             t= (float)(i+1)/(float)(LINK_RESOL-1);
02628             UI_ThemeColorBlend(th_col1, th_col2, t);
02629             glVertex2f((1.0f-t)*coord_array[0][0]+t*coord_array[1][0], (1.0f-t)*coord_array[0][1]+t*coord_array[1][1]);
02630         }
02631         glEnd();
02632     }
02633     else {
02634         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
02635         for (i=0; i < LINK_RESOL; ++i) {
02636             float t= (float)i/(float)(LINK_RESOL-1);
02637             glVertex2f((1.0f-t)*coord_array[0][0]+t*coord_array[1][0], (1.0f-t)*coord_array[0][1]+t*coord_array[1][1]);
02638         }
02639         glEnd();
02640     }
02641     
02642     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
02643     
02644     /* restore previuos linewidth */
02645     glLineWidth(linew);
02646 }
02647 
02648 /* note; this is used for fake links in groups too */
02649 void node_draw_link(View2D *v2d, SpaceNode *snode, bNodeLink *link)
02650 {
02651     int do_shaded= 0, th_col1= TH_HEADER, th_col2= TH_HEADER;
02652     int do_triple= 0, th_col3= TH_WIRE;
02653     
02654     if (link->fromsock==NULL && link->tosock==NULL)
02655         return;
02656     
02657     /* new connection */
02658     if (!link->fromsock || !link->tosock) {
02659         th_col1 = TH_ACTIVE;
02660         do_triple = 1;
02661     }
02662     else {
02663         /* going to give issues once... */
02664         if (link->tosock->flag & SOCK_UNAVAIL)
02665             return;
02666         if (link->fromsock->flag & SOCK_UNAVAIL)
02667             return;
02668         
02669         /* a bit ugly... but thats how we detect the internal group links */
02670         if (!link->fromnode || !link->tonode) {
02671             UI_ThemeColorBlend(TH_BACK, TH_WIRE, 0.5f);
02672             do_shaded= 0;
02673         }
02674         else {
02675             /* check cyclic */
02676             if ((link->fromnode->level >= link->tonode->level && link->tonode->level!=0xFFF) && (link->flag & NODE_LINK_VALID)) {
02677                 /* special indicated link, on drop-node */
02678                 if (link->flag & NODE_LINKFLAG_HILITE) {
02679                     th_col1= th_col2= TH_ACTIVE;
02680                 }
02681                 else {
02682                     /* regular link */
02683                     if (link->fromnode->flag & SELECT)
02684                         th_col1= TH_EDGE_SELECT;
02685                     if (link->tonode->flag & SELECT)
02686                         th_col2= TH_EDGE_SELECT;
02687                 }
02688                 do_shaded= 1;
02689                 do_triple= 1;
02690             }               
02691             else {
02692                 th_col1 = TH_REDALERT;
02693             }
02694         }
02695     }
02696     
02697     node_draw_link_bezier(v2d, snode, link, th_col1, do_shaded, th_col2, do_triple, th_col3);
02698 //  node_draw_link_straight(v2d, snode, link, th_col1, do_shaded, th_col2, do_triple, th_col3);
02699 }
